definition: small-flowered milkwort (Polygala arvensis Willd. or P. telephioides), with roots used in Chinese medicine
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
